BackstoryDef.title: Unknown Origin
BackstoryDef.description: Not much is known about [PAWN_nameDef]'s origin and [PAWN_pronoun] probably doesn't know it [PAWN_possessive]self. [PAWN_pronoun] likely endured a childhood filled with violence and the harsh realities of greenskin life. This tough upbringing has made [PAWN_pronoun] resilient and adaptable, capable of surviving in the harshest conditions.
